title: PORTFOLIO
description: I've put a list of my favorite projects I've worked on below and hope that you'll find the time to check some of them out.

description.caption: External website for my previous employer developed by me.
Japanese-based language learning application that implements DeepL's API.
Capstone project to determine average time of common routes that the user takes, predicting the fastest one each time.
Group project developed in my bootcamp. Mock-ecommerce website.
